reportABug:
**Functional Purpose**: Title for the bug report modal
**UI Location**: Bug Report Modal (heading)
**When Users See This**: When the bug report modal is opened
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Report a bug"
bugReportSubmittedThankYou:
**Functional Purpose**: Confirmation message after a bug report is submitted
**UI Location**: Bug Report Modal (message area)
**When Users See This**: Immediately after successfully submitting a bug report
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Bug report submitted. Thank you!"
close:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to close the bug report modal after submission
**UI Location**: Bug Report Modal (button)
**When Users See This**: After a bug report has been successfully submitted
**Technical Context**: Standard button text
**Current English**: "Close"
thanksForReportingPleaseTellUsWhatIsWron:
**Functional Purpose**: Instruction for the user to describe the bug
**UI Location**: Bug Report Modal (label for textarea)
**When Users See This**: When the bug report modal is first opened or before submission
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Thanks for reporting. Please tell us what is wrong."
pleaseProvideAsMuchDetailAsPossible:
**Functional Purpose**: Placeholder text for the bug description input field
**UI Location**: Bug Report Modal (textarea placeholder)
**When Users See This**: When the bug report modal is first opened or before the user types in the textarea
**Technical Context**: Placeholder for a text input. It must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Please provide as much detail as possible"
submitBugReport:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to submit the bug report
**UI Location**: Bug Report Modal (button)
**When Users See This**: When the user has filled in the bug report details and is ready to submit
**Technical Context**: Standard button text
**Current English**: "Submit bug report"
cancel:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to cancel and close the bug report modal without submitting
**UI Location**: Bug Report Modal (button)
**When Users See This**: When the user decides not to submit a bug report
**Technical Context**: Standard button text
**Current English**: "Cancel"
confirmFinishMentorDiscussionModal.areYo:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading to ask for confirmation before ending a mentor discussion.
**UI Location**: Confirm Finish Mentor Discussion Modal (heading).
**When Users See This**: When a student attempts to end a mentor discussion.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Are you sure you want to end this discussion?"
confirmFinishMentorDiscussionModal.feelL:
**Functional Purpose**: Explanatory text about when to end a mentor discussion.
**UI Location**: Confirm Finish Mentor Discussion Modal (paragraph).
**When Users See This**: When a student attempts to end a mentor discussion.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "When you feel like the mentoring has reached its natural conclusion, or you simply don't wish to proceed further, it's time to end the discussion."
confirmFinishMentorDiscussionModal.cance:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to cancel ending the mentor discussion.
**UI Location**: Confirm Finish Mentor Discussion Modal (button).
**When Users See This**: When a student has opened the modal but decides not to end the discussion.
**Technical Context**: Standard button text.
**Current English**: "Cancel"
confirmFinishMentorDiscussionModal.revie:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to proceed with reviewing and ending the mentor discussion.
**UI Location**: Confirm Finish Mentor Discussion Modal (button).
**When Users See This**: When a student confirms they want to end the discussion.
**Technical Context**: Standard button text.
**Current English**: "Review and end discussionâ€¦"
